name: MicrosoftTeams
help: Microsoft Teams is a hub for teamwork in Office 365. Keep all your team's chats, meetings, files, and apps together in one place.

properties.name: Summary
properties.help: A string used for summarizing card content. This will be shown as the message subject. This is required if the text parameter isn't populated.

properties.name: ThemeColor
properties.help: Specifies a custom brand color for the card. The color will be displayed in a non-obtrusive manner.

properties.name: Text
properties.help: The main text of the card. This will be rendered below the sender information and optional title, and above any sections or actions present.

properties.name: Title
properties.help: A title for the Connector message. Shown at the top of the message.

properties.name: Context
properties.help: Actions can be presented to the user by including a Schema.org JSON-LD object.

properties.name: Type
properties.help: Currently only supports ViewAction, which creates a hyperlinked action button at the bottom of the connector card.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the action. (Shown as the Button text).

properties.name: Target
properties.help: Target of the action. (The destination hyperlink).

properties.name: Title
properties.help: The title is displayed as larger, bold text near the top of a message attachment.

properties.name: ActivityTitle
properties.help: Title of the event or action. Often this will be the name of the "actor".

properties.name: ActivitySubtitle
properties.help: A subtitle describing the event or action. Often this will be a summary of the action.

properties.name: ActivityImage
properties.help: An image representing the action. Often this is an avatar of the "actor" of the activity.

properties.name: ActivityText
properties.help: A full description of the action.

properties.name: Facts
properties.help: A list of facts, displayed as key-value pairs.

properties.name: Text
properties.help: Optional text that will appear before the activity.

properties.name: Markdown
properties.help: Set this to false to disable markdown parsing on this section's content. Markdown parsing is enabled by default.
